name: KnubiSoft
tagline: Developing Software for Your Business Growth
description:
KnubiSoft develops software solutions for your business growth. 
The company started in 2012 after we launched several unique own products in local market. Our passion for these products helped us accumulate enough experience and technological expertise, which we now offer to our clients around the world. 
We are focusing our primary activity on: 
• Web Development 
• Mobile Development 
• Embedded System Development 
Most of the projects that KnubiSoft executed were related to the following business domains: 
• E-Commerce Solutions 
• Business Automation Solutions
• Leisure and Travel Solutions 
• Education and E-learning Solutions 
Our rockstar team is always willing to implement the cutting edge technologies and take full responsibility for the final project outcome. We always try to focus on your business goals first and develop high-quality software that allows your business to grow and flourish.
